thread.title: BRIEF-Appaloosa Dissolves Share Stake In GM & Whirlpool, Ups Stake In Allergan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Appaloosa Dissolves Share Stake In GM & Whirlpool, Ups Stake In Allergan

organizations.name: brief-appaloosa dissolves share stake in gm & whirlpool

text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) -
* APPALOOSA LP DISSOLVES SHARE STAKE IN GENERAL MOTORS CO - SEC FILING
* APPALOOSA LP UPS SHARE STAKE IN ALLERGAN PLC BY 83.6 PERCENT TO 3.5 MILLION SHARES - SEC FILING
* APPALOOSA LP DISSOLVES SHARE STAKE IN WHIRLPOOL CORP * APPALOOSA LP UPS SHARE STAKE IN ALLY FINANCIAL INC BY 18 PERCENT TO 8 MILLION SHARES
* APPALOOSA LP: CHANGE IN HOLDINGS ARE AS OF DEC 31, 2017 AND COMPARED WITH THE PREVIOUS QUARTER ENDED AS OF SEPT 30, 2017 Source text for quarter ended Dec 31, 2017: ( bit.ly/2CmrRSi ) Source text for quarter ended Sept 30, 2017 ( bit.ly/2zJRjl2 )
